findings.title: Improved Sanity Checks on Parameter Updates
findings.description: DeFi protocols typically have a number of system- wide parameters that can be dynamically configured. The update logic on these parameters can be improved by applying more rigorous sanity checks.

findings.title: Generation of Meaningful Events For Important State Changes
findings.description: In Ethereum, events are indispensable and mainly used to record runtime dynamics. In particular, when an event is emitted, it stores arguments passed in transaction logs and these logs are made accessible to external analytics and reporting tools. However, there is a lack of emitting important events that reflect important state changes, specifically when the 'vault' is being updated in updateVault, there is no respective event being emitted to reflect the update of 'vault'

findings.title: Trust Issue of Admin Keys
findings.description: In the `ReHold` platform, there is a privileged `admin` account with the `DEFAULT_ADMIN_ROLE` role that plays a critical role in governing and regulating system-wide operations, but needs to be scrutinized.

findings.title: Weaknesses in Time and State Management
findings.description: Weaknesses related to improper management of time and state in an environment that supports simultaneous or near-simultaneous computation by multiple systems, processes, or threads.

findings.title: Error Conditions, Return Values, Status Codes
findings.description: Weaknesses in this category include weaknesses that occur if a function does not generate the correct return/status code, or if the application does not handle all possible return/status codes that could be generated by a function.

findings.title: Resource Management
findings.description: Weaknesses in this category are related to improper management of system resources.

findings.title: Behavioral Issues
findings.description: Weaknesses in this category are related to unexpected behaviors from code that an application uses.

findings.title: Business Logic
findings.description: Inconsistencies between implemented smart contract logic and white paper description

findings.title: Arguments and Parameters
findings.description: Weaknesses in this category are related to improper use of arguments or parameters within function calls.

findings.title: Expression Issues
findings.description: Weaknesses in this category are related to incorrectly written expressions within code.
